alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:35PM CST until January 01 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN LAUDERDALE COUNTY... At 534 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lexington, or 19 miles south of Lawrenceburg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Lexington, Anderson, Elgin, Kingtown and Whitehead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
